page.title: 06Entertainment, Thurleigh
page.content: Thurleigh has a village hall, a sports and social club and playing fields.The village hall is usedfor various activities, including a new event called the coffee hour which won a Â£10 consolation prize in the Rural Community Council 'Village Ventures competition. An unusual activity that takes place here is the lace class for girls of 9 years and over. The sports and social club and playing field were boughtby the village with grant money from the Ministry of Education and fund raising. There are football and cricket pitches, a pavillion, changing rooms and swings for the children. The facilities are used by many people both from the village and outside. There are cricket and football teams based at the club and also darts and skittles teams which play in league competitions.
